result.execSummary:
The defendant Gavin R Ortiz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Gavin R Ortiz is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Gavin R Ortiz was found guilty of Battery [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Minutes emailed to DOC.

Court reporter Lynn Schultz. Defendant Gavin R Ortiz in court.  Attorney David Karpe in court for Gavin R Ortiz.  Attorney Lillian Rose Nelson in court for State of Wisconsin.
Plea Questionnaire & Waiver of Rights Signed. Def entered a plea of guilty to count(s) 2.  Court accepted defendant's plea, found and adjudged defendant guilty. 

AMENDMENTS: 

On Motion of the State, the Court DISM Count # 1, 3. 

Victim Rights Compliance

COUNT #  2   
Court I/S a sentence of: 
-Serve 60 days in the DCJ, with Huber cc 22CM1376

-Stayed for 18 months probation cc to 22CM1376

CONDITIONS:

 -No threats/acts of violence against: ALB
-Certified/DOC DV treatment
-Defendant shall complete a risk and needs assessment and comply with care plan goals 
-DNA on file
-Any other conditions DOC may impose

COURT COSTS:
Ct # 2

- All CC and DNA surcharge waived. V/W surcharge due on probation

-Days credit for time served:  4 days
-Days credit if revoked: 4 days
